humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions that there are multiple foci of invasive ductal carcinoma, with the two largest foci measuring 1.4 cm and 2.5 cm. Since the largest tumor size is 2.5 cm, this falls within the T2 category of cancers that are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the predicted T stage is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is determined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the largest focus of invasive ductal carcinoma measures 2.5 cm, which falls within the T2 category (tumor size 2.1 to 5.0 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.
